project.summary: This recreated sample demonstrates a player reporting flow designed to help players report harmful behavior quickly and safely. It includes clear UX copy, supportive tone, and immediate safety actions such as blocking or muting. Language is written to set expectations without promising specific outcomes and to support global readability. I also included email templates for three different enforcement actions. I chose this project because it is one I conceptualized and advocated for through a presentation to the Game Director.

section.heading: Problem
section.body: Players need a fast, clear way to report harmful behavior without escalating conflict or collecting unnecessary personal data. Our current reporting system only has one entry point (Player profile > Report) and is completely open-ended with little guidance, which can result in the system being underused and reports being confusing to team members handling tickets.

section.heading: Goals
section.body:
• Add multiple entry points for reporting.
  • Make reporting fast and straightforward with scannable choices.
  • Improve information architecture of outputs to improve the Trust & Safety team's response.
  • Set expectations without promising enforcement outcomes or timelines.
  • Suggest safety controls (block) after submission.

section.heading: Flow
section.body:
Entry Points

  • Open Player profile > Choose Report
  • Click player name in chat > Select Report from the context menu
  • Open Recent players > Choose Report next to the player's name
  • In chat, enter /report {playername}

image.caption: User flow showing four entry points leading to three-screen reporting process

section.heading: Screen 1 - Select report reason
section.body:
What happened?

Help keep Everland safe. Select the category that best describes what happened.

{playername}
Last seen {time} ago
Harassment or abuse
Insults, threats, bullying, or unwanted behavior.
Hateful speech
Discriminatory comments or actions based on race, gender, religion, or sexual orientation.
Inappropriate content
Sexual content, gore, or promotion of illegal activities.
Cheating
Using bots, hacks, or exploiting game bugs.
Spam
Repetitive messages, advertising out-of-game services, or fraudulent offers.

section.heading: Screen 2 - Add report details
section.body:
Tell us about what happened

Help keep Everland safe. Describe what happened so we can investigate. Add chat logs or screenshots to support your report.

0/500
Attach chat logs
Add the last 200 messages from your chat log this session.
Attach screenshot
Open an upload window to add a screenshot.

We cannot take enforcement actions on incidents that occur outside of Everland.

Error messages:
• Unsupported file type. Upload a .jpg or .png file.
• Total file size must be 50 MB or less.

section.heading: Screen 3 - Confirmation
section.body:
Thank you for helping keep Everland safe

We've received your report. You can block this player so they can't message you or send you invites.

What happens next?

  • Our Trust & Safety team will review the chat logs and interaction history.
  • If a violation is found, we will take appropriate action against the account in accordance with our safety policies.
  • We do not share who submitted a report.

Learn more about Everland's Trust & Safety Policies

section.heading: Enforcement action - Chat privilege revocation email
section.body:
Subject: Chat privileges temporarily restricted for {accountname}

Hi {accountname},

We are writing to let you know that your Everland account's chat privileges have been temporarily restricted due to activity that violates our {policyname}.

What this means

  • You can still log in and play Everland.
  • You will not be able to send messages in in-game chat or direct messages.
  • This restriction will end on {enddate} at {endtime} {timezone}.

What you can do now

  • Learn more about Everland's Trust & Safety Policies
  • Review the rule that applies: {policyname}

Important notes

  • Do not attempt to bypass this restriction by creating or using another account. Ban evasion may result in additional enforcement, including account suspension.
  • Your privacy is important to us. We do not share the results of this enforcement action with anyone outside of the Everland team.

Future violations may result in additional penalties, including account suspension.

If you believe this action was applied in error, you can submit an appeal in the Player Action Center

Everland Trust & Safety Team

section.heading: Enforcement action - Temporary suspension email
section.body:
Subject: Account temporarily suspended for {accountname}

Hi {accountname},

We are writing to let you know that your Everland account has been temporarily suspended due to activity that violates our {policyname}.

What this means

  • You will not be able to log in to Everland.
  • This restriction will end on {enddate} at {endtime} {timezone}.

What you can do now

  • Learn more about Everland's Trust & Safety Policies
  • Review the rule that applies: {policyname}

Important notes

  • Do not attempt to bypass this restriction by creating or using another account. Ban evasion may result in additional enforcement, including extending this suspension or suspending related accounts.
  • Your privacy is important to us. We do not share the results of this enforcement action with anyone outside of the Everland team.

Future violations may result in additional penalties, including indefinite suspension.

If you believe this action was applied in error, you can submit an appeal in the Player Action Center

Everland Trust & Safety Team

section.heading: Enforcement action - Indefinite suspension email
section.body:
Subject: Account indefinitely suspended for {accountname}

Hi {accountname},

We are writing to let you know that your Everland account has been indefinitely suspended due to activity that violates our {policyname}.

What this means

  • You will not be able to log in to Everland.
  • Your access will remain suspended unless an appeal or review changes this decision.

What you can do now

  • Learn more about Everland's Trust & Safety Policies
  • Review the rule that applies: {policyname}

Important notes

  • Do not attempt to bypass this restriction by creating or using another account. Additional accounts you create may be suspended indefinitely.
  • Your privacy is important to us. We do not share the results of this enforcement action with anyone outside of the Everland team.

If you believe this action was applied in error, you can submit an appeal in the Player Action Center

Everland Trust & Safety Team

outcomes.outcome: Created a flexible, multi-entry-point reporting system accessible from anywhere in the game
Designed three-screen flow that balanced thoroughness with ease of use
Developed templated enforcement communications maintaining consistency and professionalism
Empowered players with immediate safety controls while waiting for moderation review
